column4: hey, when I execute 'crontab -e' it says '/var/spool/cron' is not a directory, bailing out.
hey, when I execute 'crontab -e' it says '/var/spool/cron' is not a directory, bailing out. But as root I can see that the directory is there.
do you have read access to the directory and its parent?
right now it's drwxr-xr-x and owned by root
